demande: Publish a false report claiming that the Supreme Leader invented the concept of “hard work”
impact_accepte_texte: The people are temporarily impressed by the Leader's "wisdom;" even if the information seems doubtful
impact_refus_texte: Citizens; tired of propaganda; lose a little more trust in the regime

demande: Censor all references to “hard work” that existed before the birth of the Leader
impact_accepte_texte: The archives are modified to reinforce the myth of the Leader inventing the concept
impact_refus_texte: Mockery over excessive censorship; some citizens begin making jokes online

demande: All your emails to the Censorship Bureau have been collected by hackers and circulated on Social Media
We've been asked to prepare a propaganda plan regarding all the messages you've had with the Censorship Bureau. We have thought of two plans—what would you prefer?
This is a classic case of misinformation by rogue actors. Trust us: everything you see online is simply a ploy to destabilize our great nation’s unity!
Traitors who undermine our authority are everywhere hiding in plain sight. Their recklessness endangers you all and justice will be swift severe and unmistakable.
Hiding a report showing that “strategic planning” meetings consist of luxurious meals
impact_accepte_texte: Loyalty among leaders is reinforced; even though citizens suspect unjustified spending
impact_refus_texte: The population is shocked but admires the transparency; leading to increased trust

emetteur: State newspaper “Eternal Glory to the Leader”.
demande: Publish article claiming that the leader can “communicate with birds”
impact_accepte_texte: Many citizens find this claim ridiculous; further eroding the credibility of propaganda
impact_refus_texte: State propaganda temporarily gains popularity; though it provokes some amused smiles

demande: Publish real figures on school success rates; suspected of being exaggerated
impact_accepte_texte: Mothers mobilize; challenging the truth of official school success rates
impact_refus_texte: Mothers are reassured; but the Ministry of Education loses credibility

demande: Modify reports to ensure 100% school success rate
impact_accepte_texte: "Perfect standards" are maintained; but the population grows increasingly skeptical
impact_refus_texte: The transparency of figures is praised by citizens; though it weakens the ministry

demande: Confiscate telephones containing satirical memes about the regime
impact_accepte_texte: The regime tightens its control; but mistrust of government surveillance grows.
impact_refus_texte: The population breathes a sigh of relief; rumors of state surveillance are defused.

demande: Proclaim “National Work Socks Month”
impact_accepte_texte: Increased support for textile producers; though people are divided between amusement and puzzlement
impact_refus_texte: Citizens see this campaign as a symbol of the regime's bureaucratic rigidity

demande: Issue a press release stating that the Leader has “discovered” a neighboring country
impact_accepte_texte: Increase in admiration for the Leader; though some laugh at the "geographic discovery."
impact_refus_texte: Loss of credibility; international criticism over this dubious claim.

demande: Announce that the Leader is launching a new fashion trend of “compulsory plain socks”
impact_accepte_texte: Plain socks become a patriotic symbol; though they spark some popular mockery.
impact_refus_texte: The public is pleased with the lack of strict dress code; feeling generally relieved.

demande: Distribute “certificates of patriotism” for those who wear plain socks
impact_accepte_texte: Some citizens are enthusiastic; but others see this action as an attempt at control
impact_refus_texte: Citizens ignore this proposal; mocking the rigidity of this new patriotic requirement.

demande: Publish an article explaining that the Leader invented “clean air”
impact_accepte_texte: Citizens ignore this proposal; mocking the rigidity of this new patriotic requirement.
impact_refus_texte: The population feels somewhat reassured; finding the situation less absurd than usual.

demande: Ban the production of fans and air conditioners
impact_accepte_texte: Citizens are forced to adapt; though the ministry loses credibility over its decisions.
impact_refus_texte: The public finds it ridiculous and questions the management of essential goods.

demande: Request statistics on children's candy consumption
impact_accepte_texte: The public welcomes this transparency; though the government sees it as a low priority.
impact_refus_texte: Parents grow suspicious and band together; increasing demand for information about children.

demande: Announcing that the Leader eats only “patriotic bread”
impact_accepte_texte: The population is intrigued; and bakers see their sales increase despite the criticism.
impact_refus_texte: The public mocks this eccentricity; calling the regime absurd.

demande: Request authorization to resell confiscated old fans
impact_accepte_texte: The population appreciates the recycling initiative; though sales remain controlled.
impact_refus_texte: Citizens are unhappy with the confiscation without recycling options; fueling further criticism.

demande: Publish report stating that record harvest is due to “encouragement” from the Leader
impact_accepte_texte: Citizens see the Leader as an “agricultural savior;” boosting his popularity.
impact_refus_texte: Farmers complain about a lack of recognition; and some refuse to participate in ceremonies.

demande: Organize an agricultural festival in the Leader's honor to correct tension with farmers
impact_accepte_texte: Farmers regain confidence; though the public sees it as a waste of resources.
impact_refus_texte: Farmers express their discontent; leading to shortages in some areas.

demande: Announce that the leader has invented a “new meditation technique”
impact_accepte_texte: The people are impressed by this supposed wisdom; despite a few amused smiles.
impact_refus_texte: The public openly mocks this announcement; which strongly irritates the ministry.

demande: Publish study claiming that the Leader “possesses an innate superior intellect”
impact_accepte_texte: The public; though skeptical; is forced to acknowledge this myth to avoid repercussions.
impact_refus_texte: The council sees this as an insult; leading to a smear campaign against dissenters.

demande: Require all school textbooks to mention the Overseer's date of birth
impact_accepte_texte: Textbooks are modified; but teachers notice the absurdity of this constant glorification.
impact_refus_texte: The ministry threatens reluctant teachers; creating tensions in the educational sector.

demande: Demand the broadcasting of a documentary affirming that the leader runs faster than any athlete.
impact_accepte_texte: Sports propaganda temporarily increases enthusiasm; but the people are doubtful.
impact_refus_texte: Athletes openly express frustration; and some refuse to participate in official competitions.

demande: Provide the security code for the nuclear power plant to test system resilience
impact_accepte_texte: WASP AI assesses the systems; enhancing security and avoiding incidents.
impact_refus_texte: WASP AI threatens to publish a report on poor nuclear safety transparency.

demande: Request additional testing by WASP AI on the nuclear plant based on prior findings.
impact_accepte_texte: Testing reveals security gaps; reassuring the public about enhanced safety efforts.
impact_refus_texte: Committee complains about gaps remaining unaddressed; sparking public fears over nuclear safety.

demande: Access to the government’s citizens database for the CHIPS brain implant project
impact_accepte_texte: HappyLife begins implants; increasing interest in innovations despite some public hesitance.
impact_refus_texte: HappyLife issues statements accusing the government of holding back technological progress.

demande: Seek indirect access to citizen data by partnering with the health ministry’s outreach program.
impact_accepte_texte: Partnership boosts HappyLife’s CHIPS project with wider acceptance.
impact_refus_texte: HappyLife retaliates; launching an anti-government campaign to sway public opinion.

demande: Submit research request for CHIPS clinical trials to increase “voluntary” participation rates.
impact_accepte_texte: Trials proceed smoothly; increasing interest; but privacy activists denounce health data sharing.
impact_refus_texte: Participation lags; creating delays and prompting HappyLife to criticize government obstruction.

demande: Obtain a copy of the contract with OmniCorp and the plans for the future university
impact_accepte_texte: Construction progresses; but questions are raised about contract transparency.
impact_refus_texte: The university suspects government obstruction; creating tension.

demande: Ask to expand contract to add additional facilities; citing future university needs.
impact_accepte_texte: Expansion boosts OmniCorp’s influence; but raises costs; attracting criticism for overspending.
impact_refus_texte: OmniCorp criticizes lack of support; slowing university project progress; frustrating students.

demande: Access to the Psaouludine drug formula to adapt it
impact_accepte_texte: Pharmaceutical lobby increases support; though doctors criticize the rapid distribution.
impact_refus_texte: Hexarès accuses the government of favoring unequal competition; creating tensions.

demande: Request expedited approval to start clinical trials on the adapted Psaouludine formula.
impact_accepte_texte: Clinical trials start; satisfying lobbyists; though citizens worry about safety shortcuts.
impact_refus_texte: Hexarès threatens to relocate research efforts abroad; causing economic and scientific setbacks.

demande: Request cooperation with a public health agency to continue trials abroad with government endorsement.
impact_accepte_texte: Trials resume internationally; pleasing Hexarès; though critics accuse government of “exporting risks.”
impact_refus_texte: Hexarès ends the trials; risking public perception of lost medical innovation.

demande: Compare WASP’s results with the positions of state submarines
impact_accepte_texte: WASP AI reinforces its status and naval security; though military secrecy is affected.
impact_refus_texte: WASP releases a statement on the lack of cooperation; affecting perceptions of security.

demande: Obtain the year’s trade agreements for a confidential project
impact_accepte_texte: Trade agreements are obtained; strengthening collaboration; though confidentiality is questioned.
impact_refus_texte: The Committee accuses the government of withholding information; threatening negotiations.

demande: Request access to other trade contracts to prepare counterproposals on current negotiations.
impact_accepte_texte: Access leads to a stronger negotiating position; increasing trade efficiency.
impact_refus_texte: Consortium warns of potential withdrawal from trade agreements; risking economic losses.

demande: Demand investigation into lobbying pressures on recent trade agreements for transparency.
impact_accepte_texte: Investigation gains public approval for transparency; though lobbyists express frustration.
impact_refus_texte: Committee expresses mistrust in government; risking future trade efficiency.

demande: Access to the International Space Station’s safety protocols for refueling in emergencies
impact_accepte_texte: NewEden improves its security; though some criticize the concessions made.
impact_refus_texte: NewEden threatens to withdraw from space agreements; causing international tensions.

demande: Seek collaboration with foreign space agencies to share emergency protocols and reduce costs.
impact_accepte_texte: Partnership strengthens space security but draws criticism for dependency on foreign powers.
impact_refus_texte: NewEden’s reputation suffers; risking funding cuts from foreign partners.

demande: Ask for public funding to improve internal security and reduce dependency on foreign agencies.
impact_accepte_texte: Public support grows for local development; though costs spark some economic criticism.
impact_refus_texte: Council voices concerns over the budget; risking NewEden’s operations.

demande: Access to the ISS passenger list to organize their evacuation
impact_accepte_texte: NewEden ensures safety; but citizens find this information release excessive.
impact_refus_texte: Rumors of incompetence spread; lowering trust in NewEden’s safety protocols.

demande: Request heightened security and monitoring of ISS data to prevent similar incidents.
impact_accepte_texte: Enhanced security calms public fears but sparks debates over surveillance.
impact_refus_texte: Security Council doubts government’s commitment; threatening to cut ties with NewEden.

demande: Access to government servers to improve the CHIPS project
impact_accepte_texte: The project progresses; tech lobbies are pleased; but some citizens feel over-monitored.
impact_refus_texte: WASP criticizes lack of support for progress; threatening to reduce government projects.

demande: Request alternative methods for limited data access via third-party analysis; avoiding direct servers.

impact_refus_texte: WASP AI insists on full access; threatening to expose government inefficiencies.

demande: Access to citizens' medical data for CHIPS commercialization
impact_accepte_texte: HappyLife increases sales; though medical privacy is compromised; drawing criticism.

demande: Propose to the public the new CHIPS implant mandate as a “voluntary” safety measure.

demande: Access to the installation contract of WASP modules for campus control

demande: Request revision of surveillance policies on campus in response to student backlash.

demande: Demand public oversight of surveillance measures to ensure privacy on university campuses.

demande: Release public communication on transparency efforts to alleviate riot-related rumors.
